event.name: general
event.commentary: _P1_ feeds a [wonderful|super|great|brilliant] ball through to _P0_
Delightful little [ball|pass] finds _P0_
Flick on from _P1_ waits for the one two
Neat dummy run and pass
Great footwork, great pass
Terrific skills on display
_P1_ drops the ball at _P0_'s feet
Lofted pass from _P1_ finds its mark
_T0_ are on the attack
Outstanding cross finds _P0_
_P1_ [threads|needles] a great ball to _P0_
[Lovely|Superb|Long|Excellent] pass from _P1_ releases _P0_
[Long|Short|Exquisite] floating pass from _P1_ finds _P0_
[Good|Great|Clever] passing move across the pitch and down the [right|left]
[Quick|Well timed] passing [flick|move] down the [left|right]
_P0_ slips past his man and [collects|latches] onto _P1_'s perfectly [timed|weighted] cross.
Another [clever|brilliant|thinking|decent] move [down the wing|thru the centre|across the pitch]
_P0_ [collects|latches onto] _P1_'s [thru ball|pass]
_P1_ [threads|needles] [it|the ball] through the [opponents|players] [feet|legs] and finds _P0_
_P1_ [traps|controls] [it|the ball] with his [boot|chest|thigh] and [sends it|passes|flicks on] to _P0_
_P1_ [lobs|heads] the ball towards _P0_
_P0_ twisting and turning again
_P0_ twisting desperately to loose his man
_P0_ rips [up|through] the [centre|midfield]
_P0_ [looses|spins past] his [man|marker]

event.name: lost_possession
event.commentary: _P0_ wins the ball with a perfectly timed challenge
Bad control by _P1_ lets _P0_ steal the ball off him
_P0_ [steals|takes] the ball away from _P1_ with a sliding tackle
Loose ball falls to _P0_
Crunching tackle, _P0_ [comes away with|wins] the ball
_P1_ is left stranded as _P0_ takes the ball
_P0_ makes a great interception
Not _P1_'s greatest pass as _P0_ intercepts

event.name: foul
event.commentary: [Oww|Aye korumba], that was a nasty tackle on _P0_
Surely [that's a sending off offence| _P1_'s going to get booked for that] ?
_P1_ [knocks|bowls|crashes] over _P0_ with a double footed lunge
[Nasty|Crunching] challenge on _P0_
_P0_ gets his legs taken away from him by _P1_
[Slicing|Nasty|Pulverising] challenge by _P1_ on _P0_
Vicious tackle from _P1_ leaves _P0_ lying on the floor in agony
_P1_ clinically takes out _P0_ and leaves him in agony
They don't call _P1_ [The Slayer|The Assassin|Killer|Chopper Reid] for nothing. Hes almost killed [the guy|_P0_]
Ouch that's got to hurt
_P0_ is on the ground and he ain't smiling
Don't know about _P0_ but that tackle brought tears to my eyes
Extremely high boot from _P1_ sends _P0_ to the ground
_P1_'s black belt in [Karate|Taikwondo|Jujitsu]came in handy then, as he floored _P0_

event.name: scoring_chance
event.commentary: _P0_ charges towards goal and [fires|unleashes|stabs|shoots!]
_P0_ spins and shoots
A blazing [shot|strike] from _P0_
_P0_ finds space and tries his luck.
A great opportunity opens up for _T0_
Long ball from _P1_ finds _P0_ at the [near|far] post
_P0_ [has fluffed it|can't control it|snaps a shot] and his miss kick heads [toward goal|goalward]
Great first touch heads it goalwards
_P0_'s takes it on the volley and [hammers|nails|plants] it towards goal
_P0_ [fires|shoots|blasts it|hammers it] from 22 yards, looks like it's [drifting|curving|spinning|going wide]
_P0_ [drifts|dribbles|runs|strolls|slips|sneaks] into the box, turns inside the defence and fires
_P0_ [drifts|crashes|cuts] in from the [right|left] flank and [strikes|shoots|fires]
_P0_ tries his luck from 30 yards
_P0_ [snaps|arrows|beams a] shot towards [bottom|top] [right|left] corner
_P0_ shoots from close range
[Classy|Great|inspirational] [pass|ball] from _P1_ sends _P0_ one on one with the [keeper|goalkeeper|goalie]
_P0_'s [scissor|overhead] kick heads towards the [bottom|top] [left|right] hand corner
_P0_ [waltzes|spins|drifts|rips] past two defenders, [dummies|wrong foots] the keeper and [flicks|back heels|clips] the ball [home|towards goal|goalward]
_P1_ lays the ball off to _P0_ who sends a rocket towards goal

event.name: goal
event.commentary: Goal!!!
And the ball is smacked into the back of the net!!!
_P0_ scores!!!
Goal!!Did you see that? [their goalie|_P1_] certainly didn't.
And the ball [rips|flies|bullets] straight past _P1_ and into the back of the net!!!
The ball [whistles|flies|zips] past _P1_ and it's a goal!!!
_P0_ wheels away in celebration
A truly [mesmerising|great|wonderful|fantastic|brilliant] goal!!
That [strike|Goal] has sent the fans wild
Goal!!_P1_'s [desperate|despairing|stretched] dive can't keep _P0_'s shot out
The ball [lies|is] in the back of the net!!!
Celebrations abound, they wont forget that [goal|strike|shot]in hurry
_P0_'s dance ignites the fans. He celebrates in his [well known|own] special fashion
Goal! Dipping ball from _P0_ stuns [the keeper|_P1_|_T1_]
Outstanding Goal!
_T0_ have it pay dirt. What a Goal!
Lady luck is smiling on _T0_ now
Goal! Lady luck obviously supports _T0_
[Curving|In swinging|Out swinging|Swerving] ball beats _P1_ to the line.Goal!

event.name: miss
event.commentary: [He's|_P0_'s][fired|drifted it] wide!
[He|_P0_] should have squared the ball went alone and lashed wide
[_P1_|Defender] clears
_P0_ [pushes|curls] ball over
Defender back to block, just as it seemed to open up
_P0_ [thumps|smacks] it into row Z
And the [ball|shot] creeps just past the post
That was never really going in.
Ohh what a chance lost!
Lost opportunities like that can could _T0_ match.
It looked so promising for _P0_ then.
He'd done all the hard work but couldn't finish it off
So near yet so far
So nearly going goalward
_P0_ is beginning to wonder what he has to do to score
_T0_ Have squandered [a great|their] chance there.
Great run great delivery but no reward
Lady luck has turned her back on [_P0_|_T0_]
A real let off there for _T1_
An Audacious attempt, worthy but not payment
There was no gold at the end of that rainbow run
The ball pinballs around the penalty area but finds no way in
That went everywhere except into the net

event.name: save
event.commentary: _P1_'s fingertips flicks it wide
_P1_ forced to tip _P0_'s shot over the crossbar
Great [speed|pace|skill] shown by _P0_ but _P1_ produced a [stunning|superb|just in time] blocking tackle
Low shot taken well to his [right|left] by _P1_
_P1_ gathers it with ease.
_P1_ makes a superb reflex save to tip wide
_P1_ [sprints towards|runs at|lunges at] _P0_ and blocks the shot with his [ankle|body|head|torso|leg|boot]
[Great|Brilliant|Sensational|Easy] save by the [keeper|goalie|goalkeeper]
[Saved|Caught|Stopped|Gathered] well by _P1_
ohh [he|the goalie|the keeper|_P1_] anticipated _P0_'s every move and produced a fine save
That was in by all accounts, but they forgot to tell _P1_, who some how saved the day

lg_commentary.event: start_match It's a crowd of _AT_ here as the whistle blows We're under way The two teams are greeted by a wall of noise as they take to the pitch [The crowd|_AT_ spectators] roar as the players run out from the tunnel A cloudless day, gives the impression this match is going to sparkle _AT_ [spectators|fans] can't be wrong, this is the match we have all come to watch The referee gets the nod from the linesman and we are away The [battle|struggle|fight|war|combat] begins The referees are ready, players set, the whistle blows <commentary cond="_TAVSKILLDIFF_ <= 4">The teams are well matched. We are in for [a real|an end to end] [tug of war|battle]. There's a huge gulf in the skill level. This should be a walk over for _T[_TAVSKILL0_ GE _TAVSKILL1_]_ _T[_TAVSKILL0_ LE _TAVSKILL1_]_ come into the game as underdogs. _T[_TAVSKILL0_ GE _TAVSKILL1_]_ start the game as sure favourites. <commentary cond="_TAVSKILLDIFF_ <= 1 and [_TAVSKILL0_ + _TAVSKILL1_] >=85">The clash of the [gladiators|titans] [begins|kicks off]

half_time It's half time It's a _RE_ at half time. It's a _RE_ at half time, _TL_'s manager has to find something special to spur his team on. _TL_ heads into the tunnel to await the managers scolding _TW_ are just 45 minutes away from a stunning victory Games like this make managers. _TL_ need inspiration from the top. The dropped heads tell the story. It's been no picnic here for _TL_. _TL_'s manager cops a rollicking from the fans as he leaves the dugout So far _TW_ and their manager have done everything right. _T[_POSS1_ GE 70]_ is dominating the match _T[_POSS1_ GE 60]_ have had the [lions share|better] of possession this half _T0_ may have had more possession but _T1_ have utilised theirs better _T1_ may have had more possession but _T0_ have utilised theirs better _T[_POSS1_ GE 75]_ seems to be the only team out there <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 6">Sure its a low scoring game but we've had plenty of shots <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 4">_T[_SHOTS0_ GE _SHOTS1_]_ Have had plenty of chances to [finish|seal] this game <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 2 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 3">_T[_SHOTS0_ GE _SHOTS1_]_ Have had _SHOTS[_SHOTS0_ GE _SHOTS1_]_ chances to [finish|seal|clinch] this game Its raining goals.[_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_] So far and its only the first half! There are two teams out there but only [_T[_FOULS0_ GE _FOULS1_]_|one of them] is playing football It's a blood bath out there not a football match. [So many|[_FOULS0_ + _FOULS1_]] fouls. The refs gonna need new office supplies! [So many|[_FOULS0_ + _FOULS1_]] fouls. The refs gonna need a new [book|pencil]! [_PEN0_ + _PEN1_] penalties already

event.name: extra_time
event.commentary: After a close match the game heads into extra time
It's still _RE_: extra time
After _MI_ minutes it's still _RE_: extra time
Who will breakdown first, extra time it is
It's down to determination and fitness now as we head into extra time

lg_commentary.event: penalties Who would have thought _MI_ minutes ago it would come down to this And now we have the tense drama of a penalty shoot out Two teams, equal till now in every respect,face off in penalties The teams cant do it so now it's one on one. Striker against goalie <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1">No goals so far but now we will see some as we head to penalties

end_match The match is over! _TW_ are triumphant!!! The fans boo _TL_ off the pitch After _MI_ minutes the match ends with a _RE_ The referee checks his watch and blows for full time Well that's that. It ends _RE_ _RE_, what an astonishing result for _TW_ Wow, a match to remember. [_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_] action packed goals! _TL_ were slaughtered by _GD_ goals. _TW_ will be sipping champagne tonight. What [a great victory|an amazing win] for _TW_ <commentary cond="_GD_ > 3 and _TLAYER[_GOALS1_ > _GOALS0_]_ >= _TLAYER[_GOALS1_ < _GOALS0_]_">_TL_ were up against a giant and the _RE_ scoreline, shows it

event.name: own_goal
event.commentary: Ohh no, the ball ricocheted off _P0_ into the net
It's a pinball in the penalty box, finally spinning off _P0_ across the line
Oh that's a great shot and it's deflected off _P0_ and into the back of the net
_P0_ passes the ball back to his goalie, oh no the keepers missed it! It's an own goal by _P0_!
That little misunderstanding has cost _T_TT__ a goal

event.name: header
event.commentary: _P1_ chips the ball towards _P0_ who heads the ball towards goal
Diving header by _P0_
He just floated in midair for ages, then thunder heads it towards home
That's come off the back of _P0_'s head!
[Glancing|Powerful|Flicking|Angled] header towards the net from _P0_
_P0_'s head finds the end of the long cross

event.name: post
event.commentary: Sweet strike by _P0_, hits the post
And the shot glances wide off the post
I'm surprised the post has managed to withstand that cracking shot

event.name: cross_bar
event.commentary: Ball dinked over _P1_ but hit crossbar and bounced to safety
The ball smacks into the crossbar with _P1_ stranded
_P1_ seemed to be everywhere at once, finally tipping the ball off the crossbar

event.name: penalty
event.commentary: _P0_ steps up to take the penalty
_P0_ has a chance to score with a penalty kick
_P0_ has missed a penalty before but he now has a chance to redeem himself
You have to bury the nerves, swallow and concentrate when your taking penalties
_T_POSS__ looks like they are playing for penalties.

event.name: free_kick
event.commentary: Short free-kick from _P0_
_P0_ drives free kick low and hard
_P0_ takes free-kick quickly and curls around wall
_P0_ curls the free kick over the wall
Free kick: _P0_ plays the ball out wide
Free kick: _P0_ hits a long ball up the pitch
Free kick whipped across the face of goal by _P0_

event.name: foul_yellow
event.commentary: _P1_ for dangerous slide tackle on _P0_
_P1_ for foul on _P0_
_P1_ for kicking ball away
_P1_ for time wasting
_P1_ for handball
_P1_ for stopping _P0_ taking a quick free-kick
_P1_ is booked for repeated dissent

event.name: foul_red
event.commentary: _P1_ is reprimanded for high kicking
_P1_ is given his marching orders for contempt
_P1_ for malicious showing of studs
_P1_ for intentional handball
_P1_ is sent off for stopping a clear goal scoring opportunity
_P1_ has been red carded for punching _P0_
_P1_ for swearing at opposition fans

event.name: foul_red_injury
event.commentary: _P1_ fouls and the stretcher bearers come racing on with _P0_ lying in agony on the turf
Foul by _P1_; _P0_ seems to be injured... he might have to be substituted

event.name: send_off
event.commentary: _P0_ has been sent off

event.name: injury
event.commentary: _P0_ will have to go off after what seems an ankle injury
_P0_ looks like he's badly injured

event.name: temp_injury
event.commentary: _P0_ has pulled a muscle but should be able to continue
_P0_ has picked up a slight knock
_P0_ has a large cut above his left eye but it has been patched up and he will be able to continue

event.name: stadium_breakdown
event.commentary: _T0_ is undergoing stadium problems
The floodlights have just gone out

event.name: stadium_riots
event.commentary: The peasants are revolting
And the fans are throwing flares onto the pitch
The riot police have moved in to stop fighting between sets of opposition supporters
A fan has managed to get onto the pitch and has begun to attack the referee
The fans pour onto the pitch in a full scale pitch invasion

event.name: stadium_fire
event.commentary: Fire consumes _T_TT__'s stadium
Away fans have set fire to the north stand
A flare chucked onto the touchline has started a massive blaze
A speaker has gone up in flames and the blaze spreading around the entire stadium

event.name: substitution
event.commentary: _T_TT__ make a substitution, _P0_ comes on to replace _P1_
_P1_ goes off to applause from the fans, _P0_ replaces him
_P1_ is booed off the pitch as he is replaced by _P0_
_P0_ comes off the bench to replace the _P1_
_P0_ on for _P1_

event.commentary: _T_TT__ has changed their structure to _EX_
_T_TT_ restructure themselves into a _EX_ formation

_T_TT_ change to a _EX_ style
